newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mixed in quiet traded.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mixed in quiet traded.

text.p: European public holidays left NWE oil product markets very quiet on Thursday.
Gasoline prices were a touch softer. Eurograde prices started steady but drifted down $1 as sellers found little buying interest, barges talked $192/$194.
Naphtha markets were slightly weaker with scant buying interest and weaker Asian markets weighing on prices.
Gas oil was a touch stronger on the back of 50 cent gains on the futures market, but physical deals were sparse.
Fuel oil paper markets were boosted by higher values in Asia and the United Statesbut no physical business was seen done.
